Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Northeastern in 1974...
Earned first career win on 7/13/1975...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/31/1976, off John Malone (Mal)...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/8/1981 to a 4-year deal worth $1,590,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/4/1985 to a 3-year deal worth $3,050,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1985...
Injured on 6/5/1986 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
